ComicInfo.Summary: Featuring a cool crossover with Batton Lash's Supernatural Law! Wolff and Byrd represent a zombie? Does the cheerleader have a leg to stand on? Did the zombie eat her leg? Check out the zany fun Harvey Award-nominated Batton Lash brings to ZvC, as well as other new stories!
ComicInfo.Title: Role Play; The Inarticulate Dead; In Love with a Cheerleader; Cheerleader v. Zombie!
ComicInfo.Writer: Eric M. Esquivel,Heather Finley,Steven L. Frank,Batton Lash,Steven L. Frank,Eric M. Esquivel,Heather Finley,Batton Lash
